item.title: Isabel add a quote by Eugene O'Neill
item.description: "I am so far from being a pessimist...on the contrary, in spite of my scars, I am tickled to death at life." -- Eugene O'Neill

item.title: Isabel add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "Inside us there is something that has no name, that something is what we are." -- José Saramago

item.title: Isabel add a quote by John Waters
item.description: "You should never read just for "enjoyment." Read to make yourself smarter! Less judgmental. More apt to understand your friends' insane behavior, or better yet, your own. Pick "hard books." Ones you have to concentrate on while reading. And for god's sake, don't let me ever hear you say, "I can't read fiction. I only have time for the truth." Fiction is the truth, fool! Ever hear of "literature"? That means fiction, too, stupid." -- John Waters

item.title: Isabel add a quote by John Waters
item.description: "If you go home with somebody, and they don't have books, don't fuck 'em!" -- John Waters
